name: Classroom

features.interactive_text: No way, I'm not wasting time reading that! If you want to find Summer, we better actually get to finding her.

actions.read: Rick grabs a book and riffles through it.  "Nothing of use in here, Morty.  School is such a-a-a waste of time."

actions.throw: The book lands on the ground, its pages fluttering.

longform: Wow, Morty -- this place is a little weird. According to the Portal Gun, it's Earth, identical to our own dimension, except it contains a high school age version of me! Eh, I can't say I want to stick around the school. This place is so boring. Seriously, Morty, *urp* you don't *urp* learn in school. Let's get out of here. I wouldn't mind meeting tiny me though.
shortform: Geeze Morty, why do you keep dragging me here. You can't learn anything in a school! Let's go back to Blips & Chitz!
long_description_exit: Finally!  Now-now you're doing something that makes sense, Morty.
short_description_exit: Yeah, let's go do something useful!
